thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic!
thread.title_full: Fantastic! - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Jordan O
title: Fantastic!
text: The hotel was wonderful! Great, friendly staff, all spoke english which helped my family tremendously. The food in the hotel restaurants was excellent, and the dining areas were amazing. The upstairs bar has a wonderful view of the city, and great drinks! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for accommodations in the city. It's in a good location, and as far as traffic in China goes, it is within reasonable driving time to every tourist location we visited.
